name: The Devotion of Suspect X
author: Keigo Higashino
short_description: A suspenseful novel about a brilliant mathematician who becomes involved in a murder case, testing the limits of devotion and logic.
contents: The Devotion of Suspect X follows the story of a brilliant mathematician named Ishigami who becomes entangled in a murder case involving his neighbor. As the investigation unfolds, Ishigami's loyalty and devotion are put to the test, leading to unexpected twists and revelations.

name: The Da Vinci Code
author: Dan Brown
short_description: A gripping thriller that intertwines art, religion, and history, following symbologist Robert Langdon as he unravels a conspiracy hidden in plain sight.
contents: The Da Vinci Code follows symbologist Robert Langdon and cryptologist Sophie Neveu as they uncover a conspiracy that stretches back centuries. Fueled by hidden messages and secret societies, their quest takes them across Europe as they race to solve the mystery before it's too late.

name: The Miracles of the Namiya General Store
author: Keigo Higashino
short_description: A heartwarming tale about the transformative power of kindness and redemption, centered around a mysterious general store that grants miraculous advice.
contents: The Miracles of the Namiya General Store revolves around a group of troubled individuals who seek refuge in a dilapidated general store. To their surprise, the store's mailbox allows them to communicate with the past, leading to unexpected encounters and life-changing revelations.

name: Angels & Demons
author: Dan Brown
short_description: A fast-paced thriller that follows symbologist Robert Langdon as he races against time to stop a secret society from unleashing an ancient vendetta against the Catholic Church.
contents: Angels & Demons introduces symbologist Robert Langdon as he unravels a conspiracy involving the Illuminati and the Catholic Church. Racing against time, Langdon must decipher ancient symbols and navigate the hidden corridors of Vatican City to prevent a catastrophic event.

name: The $100 Startup
author: Chris Guillebeau
short_description: A guide to starting a successful business on a shoestring budget, offering practical advice and inspiring case studies of entrepreneurs who have achieved success with minimal resources.
contents: The $100 Startup provides insights and strategies for aspiring entrepreneurs looking to start a business with minimal investment. Drawing on case studies and real-world examples, Chris Guillebeau shares practical advice on how to identify profitable opportunities, create value, and build a successful business from scratch.
